img_above_text:
Once defeated, you'll gain a Knot of Voidness, and a Monkey-Head Fungus Seed to take back to the Zodiac Village, as well as their Fungiwoman Spirit to absorb.
Fungiwoman
img_below_text:
Be sure to check the shack on the far end before leaving, as you'll find the **Sunset of the Nine Skies Drink** sittng on a table, which will restore Qi as well as health!
![Wukong YellowFlower 43.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/bb/Wukong_YellowFlower_43.jpg)

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing the player character crouching near a shack with a glowing item highlighted on a table. This item is likely the **Sunset of the Nine Skies Drink**, mentioned in the following text, which restores Qi and health. The interface displays the player's abilities and resources, including "Will x40" in the bottom-right corner. The setting appears to be a serene yet worn environment, suggesting exploration and item collection.
